TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Polo't, title = Polo't, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polo't} }

S.FORM: Pangangan Polo't a niyaro', Tahapinangan Tamdaw Itiniay i Changbin Cen no Taitung ko Polo't a niyaro', 33 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 77 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 91 ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 70 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 9 ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 7 ko tamdaw. O pa sin to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis44 , Kebalan42 , roma5 . Pitooran O finacadan no Yincomi
